member.name: M:DG.DemiEditorGUI.DeGUI.ChangePalette(DG.DemiGUI.DeColorPalette,DG.DemiEditorGUI.DeStylePalette)
member.summary: Changes the active palettes to the given ones (or resets them to the default ones if NULL)

member.name: T:DG.DemiEditorGUI.DeStylePalette
member.summary: Stores a GUIStyle palette, which can be passed to default DeGUI layouts when calling DeGUI.BeginGUI, and changed at any time by calling DeGUI.ChangePalette. You can inherit from this class to create custom GUIStyle palettes with more options.
